name: Capt'n Slippy
description:
Game for the Ludum Dare 49. The theme was "Unstable", so we made a pirate battle in the sea!

Fight against the enemy ship. The fastest to load the canon and shoot with accuracy wins.

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow keys -> Move

Spacebar -> Grab objects

Hope you like it!

Team:

emrod -> Programmer

idontkillcoyotes -> Programmer

Emaigualmc2_art -> Artist

The_Fazzo -> Composer / sound designer
